pulseclick.midnightconfig.title: Pulse Click Config
pulseclick.midnightconfig.raidFarmModeCo: Will hold right click when player has no active bad omen effect. Use this in raid farms.
pulseclick.midnightconfig.tickBetweenCli: If you have the timing mode set to "Execute after X Ticks", this is the number of ticks between each click:
pulseclick.midnightconfig.preventStarvat: When active, PulseClick will automatically disable itself when you are below 2 hunger bars.
pulseclick.midnightconfig.preventToolBre: When active, PulseClick will automatically disable itself when the tool you are holding is about to break (durability lower than 10)
pulseclick.midnightconfig.disconnectOnLo: When active, you will automatically be disconnected and sent back to the title screen when you are below 1 1/2 hearts.
pulseclick.midnightconfig.unpauseGameOnU: Unpause the game when losing focus. Use this to keep PulseClick running in the background when not in the game window. This will disable the vanilla "Pause on focus loss" option.
pulseclick.message.starvation: §4§lStarvation detected! §r§c You need to eat something!
pulseclick.message.toolbreak: §4§lLow durability detected! §r§c You need to repair your tool!
